title: Test harness called mladmin abort on 4.2 Solaris 64 machine in test pdf-doc-conv-ent-mod-alert.xml.
description:
Test harness called mladmin abort on 4.2 Solaris 64 machine in test pdf-doc-conv-ent-mod-alert.xml.
	
Test Name : pdf-doc-conv-ent-mod-alert.xml
Machine Name : sol10-amd64-42-test-2
ML Version : 20121203
Path to Error Log : /space/logs.20121203/ErrorLog.txt

Thread causing abort:
---------------------------------------------------

----------------- lwp# 1 / thread# 1 --------------------
fffffd7ffedcccba waitid (0, ea4, fffffd7fffdfe5d0, 3)
fffffd7ffedbae1d waitpid () + 7d
0000000001f38d34 _ZN4xdmp6pstackEPKc () + c4
0000000001f38f08 sigabrtHandler () + 18
fffffd7ffedc7126 __sighndlr () + 6
fffffd7ffedbba22 call_user_handler () + 252
fffffd7ffedbbc3e sigacthandler (6, 0, fffffd7fffdfe8b0) + de
--- called from signal handler with signal 6 (SIGABRT) ---

0000000001f60208 _ZN4xdmp3runEv () + 38
